original_text: You complain about your wounds. You say that your pain will never get better. But I had to punish you, because you are very wicked, and you are guilty of many sins. You complain about your wounds.
korean_text: 너는 어찌하여 네 상처 때문에 부르짖느냐 네 고통이 심하도다 네 악행이 많고 네 죄가 허다하므로 내가 이 일을 너에게 행하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You say that your pain will never get better.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 고통이 결코 나아지지 않을 것이라고 말한다.

sentences.original_text: But I had to punish you,
and you are guilty of many sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 많은 죄에 대해 유죄하다.
